item.title: People NULL my server
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

[quote="`Worx, post:7, topic:234911"][quote author=sabsabi link=topic=309772.msg2474176#msg2474176 date=1223164785]
thats what i do but they keep changing ip then send null again… they send null of all go free bot…edos…ddos…omg… i wanna stop them how!!!

Reward: admin on server + ++
[/quote]

Its impossible to stop nulls, aside from a server auto restarter, or restarting server would erase the nulls as well. As for a SYI blocker, they have a few out there that work, not sure where you could find a good one…

But the server restart is necessary to eliminate the nulls… just so you know.[/quote]
Shows what you know… Heres how to stop nulls…

  1. Make the server disconnect the player correctly
  2. Fix the servers threading
  3. Allow only 1 login per ip (I know your saying that the IP changes, but people make there own “nullers” where the IP doesn’t change).

Read full topic

item.title: People NULL my server
item.dc:creator: @_Worx `Worx
item.description:
@_Worx wrote:

[quote=“sabsabi, post:6, topic:234911”]thats what i do but they keep changing ip then send null again… they send null of all go free bot…edos…ddos…omg… i wanna stop them how!!!

Reward: admin on server + ++[/quote]

Its impossible to stop nulls, aside from a server auto restarter, or restarting server would erase the nulls as well. As for a SYI blocker, they have a few out there that work, not sure where you could find a good one…

But the server restart is necessary to eliminate the nulls… just so you know.

Read full topic
